basic.floral_language:
Hydrangea M. Magical Emerald
Floriography: loyalty, perfect, beautiful 
Hydrangea leaves are green and wide oval. It is rich in color varies from pure color to the gradients of color. Flower pattern is plump, nearly spherical, luxuriant appearance like the bride bouquet. Because of its perfect pattern and implied good meaning, Hydrangea is commonly used in festival decoration or landscape display of parks. 
Hydrangea likes half overcast environment, place under appropriate scattered light. Flowering from June to August and ornamental period up to a month at a time.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-August, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color from white to deep green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade environments, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, half dormant in summer, reduce water and fertilization, may spray water in the air to cool
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
